description.description: A short description of this OAuth client.
description.example: Integrate Acme Inc's services into Outline.

developerName.description: The name of the developer who created this OAuth client.

developerUrl.description: The URL of the developer who created this OAuth client.

avatarUrl.description: A URL pointing to an image representing the OAuth client.

redirectUris.description: List of redirect URIs for the OAuth client.

published.description: Whether the OAuth client is available to other workspaces.
